# Mr. IIoT

> Mr. IIoT specializes in providing advanced IoT solutions that drive digital Industry 4.0 transformation and industrial automation. They empower businesses to leverage the Internet of Things to increase operational efficiency, enhance business intelligence, and foster process optimization.

Based in Chicago, IL, Mr. IIoT brings 15+ years of expertise in Digital Transformation & IIoT Solutions, specializing in digitally transforming manufacturing. Their core offerings include the SHARC IoT Sensor Adapter, machine data integration, analytics, and comprehensive Industry 4.0 transformation services.

## Pages
- [Home](https://MRIIOT.github.io/mriiotdotcom/): Home page with hero, services overview, testimonials.
- [About](https://MRIIOT.github.io/mriiotdotcom/about.html): Learn about Mr. IIoT's bio, timeline, and values.
- [Services](https://MRIIOT.github.io/mriiotdotcom/services.html): Detailed services offered, including SHARC IoT Sensor Adapter, Machine Data Integration, and Analytics.
- [Solutions](https://MRIIOT.github.io/mriiotdotcom/solutions.html): Explore IT/OT Connectivity, Digital Transformation, Machine Monitoring, and other solutions.
- [Process](https://MRIIOT.github.io/mriiotdotcom/process.html): Understand Mr. IIoT's methodology for assessment, design, implementation, and optimization.
- [Contact](https://MRIIOT.github.io/mriiotdotcom/contact.html): Contact information and booking details.
- [Free Assessment](https://MRIIOT.github.io/mriiotdotcom/audit.html): Book a complimentary digital transformation assessment.
